content: CP 643 N firestop collars BS and UL compliant, FM approved retrofit firestop collar to help create a fire and smoke barrier around existing pipe penetrations ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop collars, wraps and bandages- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed to simplify firestopping of combustible pipes through fire-rated walls and floors Latch mechanism for quicker and easier closure Flexible hook positioning for convenient fastening Can be uninstalled Applications Plastic pipes with diameters from 32-160 mm For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete, Drywall, Masonry LEED VOC: 7.6 g/l Expansion ratio (unrestricted, up to): 1:17 Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete, Drywall, Masonry | LEED VOC | 7.6 g/l | Expansion ratio (unrestricted, up to) | 1:17 | Expansion temperature (Approx.) | 482 째F | Can be painted | No | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 째F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 째F | Temperature resistance range | -4 - 212 째F ### ITEMS- 304325 - FS collar CP 643N 1.5 - Package Size 1 pc - 304326 - FS collar CP 643N 2 - Package Size 1 pc - 304328 - FS collar CP 643N 3 - Package Size 1 pc - 304329 - FS collar CP 643N 4 - Package Size 1 pc - 304331 - FS collar CP 643N 6 - Package Size 1 pc - 283213 - FS collar CP 643 4 10 pk - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 10x FS collar CP 643N 4 - 283215 - Firestop collar CP 643 6 10 pk - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 10x FS collar CP 643N 6 - 283211 - FS collar CP 643 3 40 pk - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 40x FS collar CP 643N 3 - 283207 - FS collar CP 643 1.5 80 pk - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 80x FS collar CP 643N 1.5 - 283209 - FS collar CP 643 2 100 pk - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 100x FS collar CP 643N 2
